column5: Newly constructed studio apartment (over a garage woodworking shop -- garage and studio built 3 years ago when house was rehabbed) with queen size bed & queen size sofa bed (new springs and mattress). Walk to the Museum Reach of the RiverWalk; less than 2 miles to the Alamo. Quiet, private, safe, and secure. Gated driveway away from the street. Clean, charming, comfortable, & close to everything. Welcome!
